General.Name: Hainan Drinda Automotive Trim Co Ltd
General.Description: Hainan Drinda New Energy Technology Co., Ltd. designs, researches, develops, produces, and markets automotive interior and exterior trims. It offers dashboards, bumpers, door guards, and other trims. The company was formerly known as Hainan Drinda Automotive Trim Co., Ltd and changed its name to Hainan Drinda New Energy Technology Co., Ltd. in September 2022. Hainan Drinda New Energy Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Haikou, China.
General.Address: Haikou Free Trade Zone, Haikou, China, 570216
